channel.title: Comments on: Are you local?
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Smarty
item.dc:creator: Smarty
item.description:
Correct - although the BBC has been fairly anal about taking it down from some of the usual channels.
I highly recommend it!
item.content:encoded:
Correct – although the BBC has been fairly anal about taking it down from some of the usual channels.

I highly recommend it!

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I haven't. Another friend just recommended it to me as well. It doesn't look like it is out on DVD yet. I suppose it can be found via the usual channels.
item.content:encoded: I haven’t. Another friend just recommended it to me as well. It doesn’t look like it is out on DVD yet. I suppose it can be found via the usual channels.

item.title: By: Smarty
item.dc:creator: Smarty
item.description: I quite enjoyed it when I saw it a few years ago. I like weird, character-based comedy. Speaking of which, have you seen "The Mighty Boosh" yet?
item.content:encoded: I quite enjoyed it when I saw it a few years ago. I like weird, character-based comedy. Speaking of which, have you seen “The Mighty Boosh” yet?
